COEX Offsite

 <https://onechalhoub.connexionsnow.com/mtracking/linkref.php?link1id=1243&user=10620> 	

Our team had COEX Offsite—a day to connect, collaborate, and celebrate. From Human Roulette to thought-provoking discussions and a powerful closing moment, every part of the day reflected our shared drive to elevate how we operate and collaborate. 
We launched COEX earlier this year, a transformative initiative focused on optimizing our end-to-end operations, enhancing efficiency, and improving customer and brand satisfaction.
Read more <https://onechalhoub.connexionsnow.com/mtracking/linkref.php?link1id=1243&user=10620> 

 <https://onechalhoubmedia.connexionsnow.com/newsletter/numbers/02-2-min.png>

Our team had COEX Offsite—a day to connect, collaborate, and celebrate. From Human Roulette to thought-provoking discussions and a powerful closing moment, every part of the day reflected our shared drive to elevate how we operate and collaborate. 
We launched COEX earlier this year, a transformative initiative focused on optimizing our end-to-end operations, enhancing efficiency, and improving customer and brand satisfaction.
Read more <https://onechalhoub.connexionsnow.com/mtracking/linkref.php?link1id=1243&user=10620> 

 <https://onechalhoubmedia.connexionsnow.com/newsletter/numbers/02-2-min.png> 	

People in Focus | Fouad Amoura

Meet Fouad Amoura, our Fashion Consultant at Ferragamo in Dubai Mall. Fouad tells us how joining the Group a year ago marked the beginning of a meaningful chapter in his life, one filled with growth, passion, and purpose.  
Check out <https://onechalhoub.connexionsnow.com/mtracking/linkref.php?link1id=1244&user=10620>  what Fouad says about his journey with the Group.

 <https://onechalhoub.connexionsnow.com/mtracking/linkref.php?link1id=1244&user=10620>

<https://onechalhoub.connexionsnow.com/mtracking/linkref.php?link1id=1244&user=10620> 	
 <https://onechalhoubmedia.connexionsnow.com/newsletter/numbers/03-3-min.png> 	

Beauty x Faces Offsite

 <https://onechalhoubmedia.connexionsnow.com/ec3938b200b2614e0f2ead967c282b6c359333104.gif> 	

On Wednesday, June 4th, Beauty  and FACES team came together at the St. Regis Downtown for a powerful offsite experience. With 46 participants, the day was a meaningful reminder of what we can achieve when we connect with purpose, collaborate with honesty, and lead with empathy. As one united team, we deepened our understanding, aligned on shared goals, and committed to showing up for each other—openly, transparently, and wholeheartedly. Here's to working together for one purpose: the success of our Group!

 <https://onechalhoubmedia.connexionsnow.com/newsletter/numbers/04-4-min.png> 	

Tryano’s End of Season Sale is now LIVE!

Enjoy up to 50% off on summer-ready dresses, shoes, accessories, and more — perfect for refreshing your wardrobe this season.

Whether you're jet-setting or staying local, find your feel-good look at Tryano. 

Shop now at Tryano store, Abu Dhabi.

 <https://onechalhoubmedia.connexionsnow.com/2700bb0a108248a9f54037a00b3bdd4a656011549.png> 	
 <https://onechalhoubmedia.connexionsnow.com/newsletter/numbers/05-2-min.png>

 <https://onechalhoub.connexionsnow.com/mtracking/linkref.php?link1id=1245&user=10620>

<https://onechalhoubmedia.connexionsnow.com/2700bb0a108248a9f54037a00b3bdd4a656011549.png> 	
 <https://onechalhoubmedia.connexionsnow.com/newsletter/numbers/05-2-min.png> 	

Welcome Jorge Lluch


 <https://onechalhoub.connexionsnow.com/mtracking/linkref.php?link1id=1245&user=10620> 	

Jorge Lluch joins the Group as Vice President – Loyalty, reporting directly to Amit Keswani. He brings over 15 years of international experience in loyalty strategy and consumer engagement. 
Jorge combines a consumer-first mindset with a focus on long-term program sustainability and the kind of “surprise and delight” spirit that defines truly effective loyalty programs. He believes in loyalty as a strategic growth driver and in building propositions that deliver tangible value to both consumers and businesses.
Read more <https://onechalhoub.connexionsnow.com/mtracking/linkref.php?link1id=1245&user=10620> 

For inquiries and to share your news in the Internal News please contact rasha.nashashibi@chalhoub.com <https://onechalhoub.connexionsnow.com/mtracking/linkref.php?link1id=1246&user=10620>
